```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F,
                      message = F,
                      warning = F)

library(tidyverse)
library(mapview)
library(tmap)
library(sp)
library(raster)
library(sf)
library(here)
library(rgdal)

```

```{r maps, echo = F, message = F, warning = F, include = F}

sensors <- st_read(here('data', 'Sensors.shp'))
#nhd_hr <- readOGR(here('data', 'NHD_HR_flowlines.shp'))
#nhd_mr <- readOGR(here('data', 'NHD_MR_flowlines.shp'))
st_sites <- st_read(here('data', 'ST Sites.shp'))
st_test_sites <- st_read(here('data', 'ST Test Sites.shp'))
wbdhu8 <- st_read(here('data', 'WBDHU8.shp'))

#read in FF_predictions raster
ff <- raster(here('data', "predicted_flow_fraction.tif"))

ff[ff < 0] <- NA

crs_target <- CRS("+init=EPSG:4269")

ff <- projectRaster(ff, crs = crs_target)

# 21
huc21 <- wbdhu8 %>%
  filter(OBJECTID == 21)

ff_21 <- crop(ff, huc21)

mapview(ff_21, maxpixels =  9766632) 

# 19
huc19 <- wbdhu8 %>%
  filter(OBJECTID == 19)

ff_19 <- crop(ff, huc19)

mapview(ff_19, maxpixels = 5822533)

# 76
huc76 <- wbdhu8 %>%
  filter(OBJECTID == 76)

ff_76 <- crop(ff, huc76)

mapview(ff_76, maxpixels =  3132435)

# 77
huc77 <- wbdhu8 %>%
  filter(OBJECTID == 77)

ff_77 <- crop(ff, huc77)

mapview(ff_77, maxpixels =  4437807)

# 78
huc78 <- wbdhu8 %>%
  filter(OBJECTID == 78)

ff_78 <- crop(ff, huc78)

mapview(ff_78, maxpixels =  11794956)

# 91
huc91 <- wbdhu8 %>%
  filter(OBJECTID == 91)

ff_91 <- crop(ff, huc91)

mapview(ff_91, maxpixels =  12439104)



```
